nodes.text: The Lorellian language was the language developed by residents of the planet Lorell, which was located in the Hapes Cluster.

In 44 ABY, the Hapan Royal Navy assisted the New Jedi Order during the evacuation from the Jedi Academy on the planet Ossus, which came under attack by the Lost Tribe of Sith. During the evacuation, the Millennium Falcon strayed into the free-fire zone, prompting Aegel Squadron, a Hapan Miy'til starfighter squadron, into firing. Hapan agent Taryn Zel, who was aboard the Millennium Falcon, sent a message in ancient Lorellian to the officer of the Aegels and quickly cleared the misunderstanding.
